entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of snow this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
